languages.text: "Ты всегда верил только в себя, а в Него — нет. Что же, Он тоже в тебя не поверил".

traits.locale_text: "Ты знал риски, ты знал, что всё этим закончится... И все равно, один священник — вся защита, на которую ты полагался, ничтожество?"

languages.text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
languages.original_text: "Ты всегда верил только в себя, а в Него — нет. Что же, Он тоже в тебя не поверил".

traits.locale_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
"You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
"You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
"You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
"You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
"You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

languages.text: «Siempre creíste en ti mismo, no en Él. Resulta que Él tampoco creía en ti».
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre creíste en ti mismo, no en Él. Resulta que Él tampoco creía en ti».

languages.text: 「あなたは、いつもあの方ではなく、自分のことを信じていた。まあ、あの方もあなたを信じてはいないさ」
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは、いつもあの方ではなく、自分のことを信じていた。まあ、あの方もあなたを信じてはいないさ」

languages.text: “你始终都只相信你自己，根本不相信神皇。所以你看，神皇也怀疑你。”
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

traits.locale_text: “你始终都只相信你自己，根本不相信神皇。所以你看，神皇也怀疑你。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt immer nur an Euch selbst geglaubt nicht an ihn. Nun, er hat Euch nicht an Euch geglaubt."
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt immer nur an Euch selbst geglaubt nicht an ihn. Nun, er hat Euch nicht an Euch geglaubt."

languages.text: « Vous avez toujours cru en vous plutôt qu'en Lui. Eh bien, lui aussi, il a fini par ne plus croire en vous. »
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez toujours cru en vous plutôt qu'en Lui. Eh bien, lui aussi, il a fini par ne plus croire en vous. »

languages.text: "Her zaman kendine güvendin, O'na hiç güvenmedin. Karşılığında O da sana güvenmedi."
languages.original_text: "You had always believed in yourself, not in Him. Well, He disbelieved in you too."
